EmailTemplate.name: Reply to RSVP
EmailTemplate.subject: See you on Feb 25th!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for reserving your seat to the Lighthouse360 networking event on November 18th.
The event starts at 7pm at The Flatiron Room. The Flatiron Room is located at 37 West 26th St. between 6th Ave. and Broadway in the Flatiron District.
We’ll have an open bar and appetizers for you from 7pm - 8:30pm. Come network with your peers and also learn about Lighthouse 360’s Certified Partner Program.
Here is the agenda:
7pm - 8pm: Networking. Open Bar. Appetizers.
8pm - 8:30pm: Short presentation on Lighthouse 360 Certified Partner Program
The Flatiron Room is known for it’s rare whiskey collection. We have enabled you to participate in a whiskey tasting from 8:30 - 9pm if you are interested.
8:30 - 9pm: Optional Whiskey Tasting
If you’re interested in attending the Whiskey tasting, please reply and let us know.
We’re looking forward to seeing you at the Flatiron Room on Nov. 18th at 7pm.
{!Account.OwnerFirstName}
